    • Method Detail

      • send

        public void send(XMLMessage message,
        Destination topic)
          throws JCSMPException
        Description copied from interface: DestinationProducer
        Sends a message to a specific destination.

        A new message ID is assigned to the message automatically every time this method is called. The message also becomes read-only, and it cannot be modified by the client application.

        Specified by:
        send in interface DestinationProducer
        Parameters:
        message - The message to be sent.
        topic - The destination to send to.
        Throws:
        JCSMPException - upon failure.
        InvalidOperationException - when called on a closed producer.

      • send

          throws JCSMPException
        Description copied from interface: DestinationProducer
        Sends to the default destination
        Specified by:
        send in interface DestinationProducer
        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • createBytesXMLMessage

        public BytesXMLMessage createBytesXMLMessage()
                                      throws JCSMPException
        Description copied from interface: Producer
        Applications use this method to create a BytesXMLMessage.

        NOTE: Applications must not cache the created object based on the assumption that the method returns a new object each time. The JCSMP implementation can reuse the same object by resetting its content.

        Specified by:
        createBytesXMLMessage in interface Producer
        Returns:
        An instance of BytesXMLMessage.
        Throws:
        InvalidOperationException - when called on a closed producer.
        JCSMPException
        See Also:
        Acquiring message instances

      • createMap

        public SDTMap createMap()
        Description copied from interface: Producer
        Create maps for use as user properties or as structured payload. There is nothing tying the returned map to the producer that created it. The map can be used by any producer in any message.
        Specified by:
        createMap in interface Producer
        Returns:
        A new instance of SDTMap.

      • createStream

        public SDTStream createStream()
        Description copied from interface: Producer
        Create streams for use as structured payload. There is nothing tying the returned stream to the producer that created it. The stream can be used by any producer in any message.
        Specified by:
        createStream in interface Producer
        Returns:
        A new instance of SDTStream.
